name: Attack of the Space Cats
description:
Small Wave based Twin stick Game for the Unreal 4 Summer Game Jam.

Team name: Team Squidge

Game name: Attack of the space cats

List of premade assets:

Game music by AudioWonder

Death sound by opengameart.org

Particle effects by W3 Studios

controls:

W = UP

A = LEFT

S = DOWN

D = RIGHT

Directional arrows = fire in direction
